00005     IDField::IDField(std::string fieldName, unsigned index, unsigned startBit, unsigned endBit)
00006             : fieldName(fieldName), index(index), startBit(startBit), endBit(endBit) {
00007 
00008         // Create bit mask for the field.
00009         bitMask = IDField::createBitMask(startBit, endBit);
00010     }

00032     unsigned IDField::createBitMask(unsigned startBit, unsigned endBit) {
00033         unsigned mask = 0;
00034         for (int i = startBit; i <= endBit; i++) {
00035             mask |= 1 << i;
00036         }
00037         return mask;
00038     }
